___integration.description: Allow to integrate with embedded websites (applicable to website mime-types only).

___name.description: The window.name that is visible to any embedded website.

___fallback.description: Allow to open content in a new browser-window on specific platforms.

default._8_de: Bitte klicken, um das Dokument anzuzeigen!
default._8_en: Please click here to display the document!

___i18nHtmlText.description: Text to display on the fallback-link.

___layout.description: Tells how the display size is calculated.

___sizeToContent.description: If true, the media content determines the rendering size (container otherwise).

___medium.description: Identifies which media content to display.

___showTitle.description: If available, show a title above the media content.

___showCaption.description: If available, show a caption below the media content.

___resource.description: A resource topic under which a document resource can be obtained.

___onActions.description: List of actions, any of which triggers loading media content. If omitted, content is loaded immediately.

items.description: An action that triggers loading media content.

___i18n.description: Which locale to use for displaying this widget.

___locale.description: The topic under which to expect the locale for this widget.

name: laxar-media-widget
